name: Campus Classic LX
longDescription: Campus Classic LX features a durable canvas upper, cushioned EVA midsole, and rubber outsole. Perfect for everyday wear with a retro vibe.

name: Campus Runner 2.0
longDescription: Campus Runner 2.0 sports a breathable mesh upper, responsive foam midsole, and grippy rubber outsole. Engineered for speed and comfort.

name: Campus Trailblazer
longDescription: Trailblazer comes with a waterproof PU upper, reinforced toe guard, and multidirectional lug pattern. Your adventure-ready companion.

name: Campus Skate LX
longDescription: Campus Skate LX features a suede upper, padded collar, and vulcanized rubber outsole. Built to withstand the skatepark grind.

name: Campus FlexFit
longDescription: FlexFit combines a knit upper with TPU overlays, a supportive heel counter, and multi-directional flex grooves for gym and court use.

name: Campus Court Pro
longDescription: Court Pro delivers enhanced lateral support, breathable perforations, and a durable herringbone outsole for clay and hard court play.

name: Campus Street Snap
longDescription: Street Snap combines synthetic leather upper, cushioned sockliner, and sleek low-profile outsole. Turn heads on city pavements.

name: Campus AquaStep
longDescription: AquaStep features quick-drain mesh, slip-resistant outsole, and anatomical footbed. Ideal for boating, beach, and poolside fun.

name: Campus HighTop OG
longDescription: HighTop OG brings back 80s basketball style with a leather upper, padded tongue, and durable rubber cupsole. Court to street ready.

name: Campus Slip-On Ease
longDescription: Slip-On Ease offers an elastic gore panel, lightweight canvas upper, and memory foam insole. Effortless on and off for daily wear.
